description:
Montreal, March 16th, 2015, by Greg Ward - Learning to write high-quality, reusable code takes years of dedicated work. Or you can take a shortcut: attend this talk and learn some of the tricks I've figured out over a couple of decades of programming.

* Contact Greg: https://twitter.com/gergdotca
* MP52: http://sflx.ca/mp52
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://sflx.ca/jobs

As seen at PyCon 2015:
/redirect?q=https%3A%2F%2Fus.pycon.org%2F2015%2Fschedule%2Fpresentation%2F338%2F&event=video_description&redir_token=ucvHTVb3kAbUsiKnAseRH4ZQIHt8MTUwNzc1NDAzNEAxNTA3NjY3NjM0&v=ov8UXvBXUio
title: How to Write Reusable Code #MP52
